title: Clustering-Based Educational Web Resource Retrieval Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet search skills and understanding of educational content structuring
context.additional_context: A course for corporate language education managers to learn efficient methods of collecting and categorizing educational materials in mobile environments

learning_goals: Classify web resources according to educational objectives into three or more categories using clustering search technology
Reorganize search results into meaningful groups based on instructional design criteria
Explain methods for utilizing basic search system functions in limited technological environments (smartphone-based)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
